lines.text:
[chatting with Inspector Wong]
The hostage asked me why I shot him. I told him the gun misfired. He says he'll sue. These guns are supplied by the UK. Go sue the England.

[Wong and Lun are being tailed by two assassins]
That bastard is still following.
I know I've failed. Tried twice to meet the guy.
I didn't mean you. I meant those guys are tailing us again.
